MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KA18 postcode area of Cumnock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:48am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations into grounded equipment in the area and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:18am on 16th January 2021.
